A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't like it. Story felt it was all over the place. The casino scene I thought was unnecessary and love between the POCs seem trying hard to me. I'm a woman\, person of color so defnitiely not an 'alt-right' hating on this movie. It's just bad. They also made Luke a cynical\, scaredy-cat guy when that's totally out of his original character. Poor exit for Mark Hamill
